get.description:
Lists all audit log entries for the given workspace id.

This is a **enterprise** feature.

parameters.name: action_type
parameters.description: Filter the audit log entries by action type.

parameters.name: from_timestamp
parameters.description: The ISO timestamp to filter the audit log entries from.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Defines which page should be returned.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Defines how many audit log entries should be returned per page.

parameters.name: sorts
parameters.description: A comma separated string of attributes to sort by, each attribute must be prefixed with `+` for a descending sort or a `-` for an ascending sort. The accepted attribute names are: `user, workspace, type, timestamp, ip_address`. For example `sorts=-user,-workspace` will sort the audit log entries first by descending user and then ascending workspace. A sortparameter with multiple instances of the same sort attribute will respond with the ERROR_INVALID_SORT_ATTRIBUTE error.

parameters.name: to_timestamp
parameters.description: The ISO timestamp to filter the audit log entries to.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Filter the audit log entries by user id.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: Filter the audit log entries by workspace id. This filter works only for the admin audit log.

error.description: Machine readable error indicating what went wrong.

oneOf.description: Human readable details about what went wrong.
Machine readable object about what went wrong.
